head.title: Michael Hyland | Web Development & Graphic Design
head.description: Oh hey, another blog. Is this really worth your time? Probably not -- yet here I am. Take it or leave it homie.

sections.title: I make super awesome websites
sections.body: I specialize in creating custom websites with a user-focused approach to ensure ease of use, visual ecstacy, and manipulative conversions

sections.title: A vulgar display of miserable failures
sections.body: I've got sites built with Shopify, I've got sites built with WordPress, I've got some fun vanilla projects as well... lots to gaze at and judge

sections.title: Oh great, another worthless dev blog
sections.body: I write about the process a lot. This is sorta my library of knowledge. I come back here often to save myself time because all this coding nonsense gets out of hand quickly.

sections.title: Drop me a line
sections.body: Let's build something cool! I can't help with anything. At the very least I can give you some pointers and steer you in the right direction. What's the crux?
